Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.process

Class CompositeProcessOrchestrationContext

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.process.CompositeProcessOrchestrationContext
public class CompositeProcessOrchestrationContext extends Object
Context used during the orchestration of a composite process.

Holds the original request from the provider that initiated the orchestration, as well as a list of requests and responses received from the consumers called during the orchestration.

It also supports storing an aggregated response for the integration-call, which can be created during the orchestration-run by integrating consumer-responses via setProcessResponse(Object, Optional). Aggregated response can be used as a temporary object that is filled through the orchestration.
